purpose: Determine if the board is safe to turn on.
scope: Short circuit check of components between power and ground terminals.
procedure: Use multimeter to measure resistance between power and ground test points.
itconclusion: Design is as expected, assembly is as expected.
otl_conclusion: Either design or assembly is not as expected. Investigation required.

purpose: Verify the voltage of power rails under no load.
scope: Measure voltages of all power rails on the DUT.
procedure: Connect multimeter to power rail test points and measure voltages.
itconclusion: Power rails are within expected range.
otl_conclusion: Power rails are outside the acceptable range.

purpose: Check signal integrity and functionality of output signals.
scope: Test key signals on the DUT for expected frequency and amplitude.
procedure: Apply known signals to input and observe output signal parameters.
otl_conclusion: Output signals deviate from design specifications.

purpose: Ensure thermal stability under continuous operation.
scope: Monitor temperature at critical components over time.
setup: Thermocouples, data logger, and powered DUT.
procedure: Measure temperatures at critical components every minute for 30 minutes.
itconclusion: Thermal performance is within acceptable range.
otl_conclusion: Thermal performance is outside acceptable range.

purpose: Verify all functionality before final approval.
scope: Test all features and functionalities of the DUT.
procedure: Perform all functional tests, including inputs, outputs, and communication protocols.
otl_conclusion: DUT fails one or more functional tests.
